title: 1999/40/EC: Commission Decision of 21 December 1998 repealing Decision 96/276/EC on certain protective measures in respect of bivalve molluscs from Tunisia (notified under document number C(1998) 4340) (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 21 December 1998 repealing Decision 96/276/EC on certain protective measures in respect of bivalve molluscs from Tunisia (notified under document number C(1998) 4340) (Text with EEA relevance) (1999/40/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Member States shall amend the measures they apply to imports to make them conform with this Decision. They shall inform the Commission of the steps taken.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 21 December 1998.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
